mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_PETINFO ( PET_SERIAL, MEMBER_SERIAL, IMAGE_SOURCE, ANIMAL_TYPE, PET_NAME, PET_GENDER, PET_VARIETY, PET_AGE, PET_SIZE, TNR, PET_WEIGHT, PET_BIRTH, NECK_LENGTH, BACK_LENGTH, CHEST_LENGTH, PET_ETC) VALUES ( PET_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_serial}, #{image_source}, #{animal_type}, #{pet_name}, #{pet_gender}, #{pet_variety}, #{pet_age}, #{pet_size}, #{tnr}, #{pet_weight}, #{pet_birth}, #{neck_length}, #{back_length}, #{chest_length}, #{pet_etc})
mapper.update: UPDATE FORM USER_PETINFO SET IMAGE_SOURCE = #{image_source}, PET_NAME = #{pet_name}, PET_GENDER = #{pet_gender}, PET_VARIETY = #{pet_variety}, PET_AGE = #{pet_age}, PET_SIZE = #{pet_size}, TNR = #{tnr }, PET_WEIGHT = #{pet_weight}, PET_BIRTH = #{pet_birth}, NECK_LENGTH = #{neck_length}, BACK_LENGTH = #{back_length}, CHEST_LENGTH = #{chest_length}, PET_ETC = #{pet_etc}
mapper.select: SELECT PET_SERIAL, MEMBER_SERIAL, IMAGE_SOURCE, ANIMAL_TYPE, PET_NAME, PET_GENDER, PET_VARIETY, PET_AGE, PET_SIZE, TNR, PET_WEIGHT, TO_CHAR(PET_BIRTH, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as PET_BIRTH, NECK_LENGTH, BACK_LENGTH, CHEST_LENGTH, PET_ETC FROM USER_PETINFO WHERE PET_SERIAL = #{pet_serial }

SELECT PET_SERIAL, MEMBER_SERIAL, IMAGE_SOURCE, ANIMAL_TYPE, PET_NAME, PET_GENDER, PET_VARIETY, PET_AGE, PET_SIZE, TNR, PET_WEIGHT, TO_CHAR(PET_BIRTH, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as PET_BIRTH, NECK_LENGTH, BACK_LENGTH, CHEST_LENGTH, PET_ETC FROM USER_PETINFO WHERE MEMBER_SERIAL = #{member_serial }
